channel.title: Serious Issue,
channel.description:
Well for my quest I have an NPC spawn and attack you when you enter a certain area. Unfortunately, when this occurs you character disconnects and this error is applied
[code]Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Zoft. java.lang.NullPointerException at Client.parseIncomingPackets(Client.java:8367) at Client.packetProcess(Client.java:7902) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:180) at Process.run(Process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Zoft disconnected (localhost)[/code]
I have no idea what to fix here, as all the Client.java is, is an UseBow = true boolean.
Help?

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

I know? Right, I would have never thought of that if it wasn’t for my old client!

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

odd lol, but at least its fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Ahh i’ve solved the problem!

Aha! This is such a strange error we could have been here forever,

In player.java

[code]str.writeBits(14, id); // client doesn’t seem to like id=0

	int z = npc.absY - absY;
	if (z < 0)
		z += 32;
	str.writeBits(5, z); // y coordinate relative to thisPlayer
	z = npc.absX - absX;
	if (z < 0)
		z += 32;
	str.writeBits(5, z); // x coordinate relative to thisPlayer

	str.writeBits(1, 0); // something??
str.writeBits(12, npc.npcType);[/code]

I had the npc.npctype at 14 and the only one that the client don’t like at 12, I need to reverse them.

Thanks a ton guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Zoft™:

Would this have anything to do with my NPCbits? As I have it changed to 14 (previously was using 16 with my old client and it worked fine).

Does the old client work as of right now?

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Well most of the time there isnt a problem, but if an npc is set to use an attack emote thats not in the client, sometimes it has this affect. Either that or maybe the npc you are using for the quest is a nonattackable one(0 hp). Would cause something like this. Can you give more details as to what npc it is, how its attacking, stuff of that nature.

72 is the attacknpc packet, so the error has to do with whenever the player attacks the npc.

Also does what you are trying to do already work on your old client?

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Would this have anything to do with my NPCbits? As I have it changed to 14 (previously was using 16 with my old client and it worked fine).

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Zoft™:

How could I go about that Zyle? Also, I didn’t have this problem with my old client, only with this new one i’m using Galkon’s Enhanced v3.1. I don’t see why there should be any problem at all.

The attacknpc number might not be read correctly. There may have been some client-side modifications for that packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

How could I go about that Zyle? Also, I didn’t have this problem with my old client, only with this new one i’m using Galkon’s Enhanced v3.1. I don’t see why there should be any problem at all.

This is so aggravating, I can’t attack any NPCs, even the ones not spawned through NewNPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Hmm, is there a break after case 72? I can’t see anything that would cause a NullPointerException.

EDIT: I don’t think there’s an Npc for the id (attacknpc)

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

[code]case 72:
// Click to attack
if (!antiHax())
break;
if (deathStage < 1) {
attacknpc = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
boolean UseBow = false;
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9185

			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9174
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9176
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9177
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9179
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9181
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9183
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11235
					|| hasCrystalBow()
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6522
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1381
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1383
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1385
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) {
				UseBow = true;
			}
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitIDNPC != 0
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitIDNPC != playerId
					&& !multiCombat()) {
				sM("Someone else is already fighting your opponent.");
				faceNPC(attacknpc);
				break;
			}
			if (hitID != attacknpc && hitID != 0 && !multiCombat()) {
				sM("I'm already under attack.");
				faceNPC(attacknpc);
				break;
			}
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 655)
				break;
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 757
					&& !playerHasItem(1550, 1)) {
				sM("The vampire is not effected by your attacks.");
				break;
			}
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 757)
				break;
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1472)
				break;
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 84)
				break;
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 2060)
				break;
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 988)
				break;
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 989) {
				sM("You must beat the first knight first!");
				break;
			}
			if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 990) {
				sM("You must beat the second knight first!");
				break;
			}
			if (UseBow) {
				toX = absX;
				toY = absY;
				newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
				newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
				getNextPlayerMovement();
			}
			if (!UseBow
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 3777
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 3778
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 3779
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 3780
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2627
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2630
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2631
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2741
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2743
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2745
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2746
					&& Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType != 2738) {
				followID2 = attacknpc;
			}
			if ((attacknpc >= 0) && (attacknpc < NPCHandler.maxNPCSpawns)) {
				IsAttackingNPC = true;

				if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].StartKilling == 0) {
					Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].StartKilling = playerId;
				}
				Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].RandomWalk = false;
				Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = true;
				faceNPC(attacknpc);
			} else {
				sM("Exception catched, npc id was invalid.");
				ResetAttackNPC();
			}
		}
		break;[/code]

Thanks Jmood and Zyle was waiting for you more knowledgeable guys to get on here.

Read full topic

item.title: Serious Issue,
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Update, just tested it, I can’t attack ANY npcs without getting that error.

5 Before:

|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1383 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1385 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) { UseBow = true;

5 After:

if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitIDNPC != 0 && Server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitIDNPC != playerId && !multiCombat()) { sM("Someone else is already fighting your opponent."); faceNPC(attacknpc); break;

All line 8367 is, is an end bracket, here.

[code]case 72:
// Click to attack
if (!antiHax())
break;
if (deathStage < 1) {
attacknpc = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
boolean UseBow = false;
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857
|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9185

			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9174
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9176
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9177
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9179
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9181
			|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 9183
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11235
					|| hasCrystalBow()
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6522
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1381
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1383
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1385
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1387
					|| playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) {
				UseBow = true;
			}[/code]

The last end bracket is 8367.

Well for my quest I have an NPC spawn and attack you when you enter a certain area. Unfortunately, when this occurs you character disconnects and this error is applied

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Zoft. java.lang.NullPointerException at Client.parseIncomingPackets(Client.java:8367) at Client.packetProcess(Client.java:7902) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:180) at Process.run(Process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Zoft disconnected (localhost)
